item.title: Â¡Destar 0.2beta released!
item.author: aleriospresidente@gmail.com (Alejandro Rios)
item.description: Yes, it’s true. Almost 6 months have passed since the last release and we have worked a lot to improve Destar and make it more stable and useful. Basically, this beta release contains: A new interface style. Referencial integrity. Better i18n support. Better statistics for CDR. Use of some asterisk 1.2.X new features. Many new features. Several Bug fixes. We hope you can enjoy testing it and helping us release the 0.
